content:
Great! Here's a recipe for chicken fried rice:

$$$
items_to_purchase_for_recipe: chicken breast, mixed vegetables, garlic, white rice, eggs, soy sauce
$$$

Cook 2 cups of white rice and set aside. In a pan, stir-fry 1 diced chicken breast, 1 cup of mixed vegetables, and 2 minced garlic cloves in 2 tbsp of oil. Add the cooked rice, 2 whisked eggs, and 3 tbsp of soy sauce, stirring until heated through. Enjoy your delicious chicken fried rice!
